ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Oh this can't be good.... (my last post on the topi c)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wasn t disagreeing with you, I was using your post as a launching board to vent. In fact, I DO agree with you, that s what troubles me.  If he doesn t
ygData.messageBody:
Adam Wasserman wrote:
>
> I am merely writing to explain my words, not to spark a debate.
>
> I am not making a judgement on Abashi. I'm not saying what is or what isn't
> his job to know. All I was saying was that based on what he wrote in his
> post, I don't think he was aware of what we were talking about.
>
> Whether he should have known or could have known or used to know has nothing
> to do with what I said.
>
> Drae

I wasn't disagreeing with you, I was using your post as a launching board to vent.
In fact, I DO agree with you, that's what troubles me. If he doesn't know by now
what we're talking about, how the heck are we supposed to get him to notice? I
honestly think that, when we talk about Chains, he thinks we're talking about the
early-break modification they made, and when we're talking about Lullaby, we're
complaining about there being a secondary resist, period, or perhaps that we're
still complaining about the lack of a secondary resist message. If he
off-handedly assumes that this is the case each time he sees a new thread, and
doesn't bother to read the thread, then we'll NEVER get him to get a clue. If he
actually READs these threads, and STILL doesn't get it, it's even more hopeless.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 52 songs, Innoruuk
